name: Mushrooms VS Pigs
description:
This is a game similar to Bomberman where the players goes around the map collecting mushrooms and using those mushrooms to defeat the pig enemies that wander the map. The mushrooms detonate as root bombs and have a limited range, so choose carefully where you place them, as there's only a limited amount on each map.

Credits:

Sean C. - Programmer

Nolan - Composer and Sound Designer

Taharka - Artist and Animator

Sean K. - Level Designer and Title Screen Programmer
